Dim oTrace
Sub generate_num
'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT generate_num..."
Dim rn pref = "" num = Data("|Document|Число_регномера").Value suf = ""
if Len(num) = 0 then 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT End generate_num(Нет номера)" Exit Sub end if
if Len(pref)>0 then rn = CStr(rn) + pref + "-" end if rn = CStr(rn) + CStr(num) if Len(suf)>0 then rn = CStr(rn) + "-" + CStr(suf) end if Data("|Document|Регистрационный_номер")=CStr(rn) Exit Sub
'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT End generate_num" err_exit: Form.MsgBox err.Description
End Sub
Sub clear_all_readonly 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT clear_all_readonly..." Data("|Document|Число_регномера").Attribute("readonly")="" Data("|Document|Дата_исполнения").Attribute("readonly")="" Data("|Document|Ответственные_за_документ").Attribute("readonly")="" Data("|Document|Исполнители_по_документу").Attribute("readonly")="" Data("|Document|Контролер").Attribute("readonly")="" Data("|Document|Срок_исполнения").Attribute("readonly")="" Data("|Document|files").Attribute("readonly")="" For Each el In Data("|Document|files") el.Attribute("readonly")="" Next 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT end clear_all_readonly" End Sub
Sub prepare_completed 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT prepare_completed..." clear_all_readonly Data("|Document|Число_регномера").Attribute("readonly")="true" Data("|Document|Дата_исполнения").Attribute("readonly")="true" Data("|Document|Ответственные_за_документ").Attribute("readonly")="true" Data("|Document|Исполнители_по_документу").Attribute("readonly")="true" 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT End prepare_completed" End Sub
Sub prepare_wfclosed 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT prepare_wfclosed..." Data("|Document|Контролер").Attribute("readonly")="true" Data("|Document|Срок_исполнения").Attribute("readonly")="true" 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT End prepare_wfclosed" End Sub
Sub prepare_finder 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT prepare_finder..." clear_all_readonly Data("|Document|files").Attribute("readonly")="true" for Each el in Data("|Document|files") el.Attribute("readonly")="true" Next 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT End prepare_finder" End Sub
Sub prepare_registration 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT prepare_registration..." clear_all_readonly Data("|Document|Число_регномера").Attribute("readonly")="true" Data("|Document|Дата_исполнения").Attribute("readonly")="true" Data("|Document|Ответственные_за_документ").Attribute("readonly")="true" Data("|Document|Исполнители_по_документу").Attribute("readonly")="true" 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT End prepare_registration" End Sub
Sub Form_NamedEvent( evt ) 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT Form_NamedEvent..."
'MsgBox "Form_NamedEvent вход '" + evt + "'", vbOKOnly, "ЕВФРАТ-Документооборот"
if evt = "dfmakestrregnum" then generate_num End If if evt = "dfrgmregistration" then prepare_registration End If if evt = "dfrgmfinder" then prepare_finder End If if evt = "dfrgmcompleted" then prepare_completed End If if evt = "dfrgmwfclosed" then prepare_wfclosed End if
If evt = "attached_files_not" Then Data("|Document|Соотношение_полей_и_реквизитов").RemoveAll End If 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT End Form_NamedEvent" End Sub
Sub Form_Load 'Set oTrace = CreateObject("TRACE.VBTracer") 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT End Form_Load" filescount = -1 End Sub
Sub Form_Unload 'oTrace.Trace " VBCRPT Form_Unload..." Set oTrace = Nothing End Sub
sub form_FieldDataChanged(field) s = field.Attribute("frm.abstoredata")
if s <> "" and field.Value = "" then Set arr = field.Parent(s)
if not arr is nothing then arr.RemoveAll end if end if
end sub
